title: Coliseu Pedestal
description:
The Coliseau Pedestal, designed by Gabriel Tan and handcrafted by artisans in Portugal, literally elevates anything you place in it, from sea glass to pistachios. Tan’s design was inspired by ancient amphitheaters, combining a Roman travertine tray with a smoked ash base. This sculptural piece celebrates the beautiful variations in tone, grain, and texture of these natural materials. Made in Portugal.
  • Roman travertine tray made by stonemason Ricardo Eira.
  • Smoked ash base crafted by woodworker Carlos Barbosa.
  • Unique, handcrafted variations in each piece.
Brand
Origin Made
General Dimensions
  • 2⅝" H 10¼" W 10¼" D 10¼" DIA
Product Weight
7.25 lbs

title: Coluna Vase
description:
The Coluna Vase (2022) is the result of a collaboration between designer Hallgeir Homstvedt and master ceramicist Joao Lourenço for Origin Made. Made from a unique, coarse clay with grains of varied sizes, developed by Lourenço specially for this piece, it has a rich, tactile surface. The Coluna Vase is hand-thrown and then fired to highlight the character of the materials. The crisp geometry of the slender column with a distinctive wide rim is juxtaposed with the rugged material. Made in Portugal.
  • Handcrafted by master ceramicist João Lourenço.
  • Created by renowned Norwegian designer Hallgeir Homstvedt.
  • Watertight vase for holding flowers or use on its own as a sculptural piece.
Brand
Origin Made
General Dimensions

title: Ridge Vase
description:
The Ridge Vase (2019) by Studio Kaksikko is a sculptural vessel for arranging flowers that looks just as attractive when not in use. It features a slim profile – in ceramic or glass – with rounded sides and concave impressions that not only lend visual interest but also double as handles for secure repositioning. Made in Portugal.
  • A sculptural vessel that's just as beautiful full as empty.
  • Slim profile with rounded sides and concave impressions.
  • Designed by Studio Kaksikko for Muuto.

Muuto

title: Nougat Vase
description:
Based in Milan, Stories of Italy is a design studio that uses time-honored techniques to create beautifully crafted modern objects. Their Nougat Collection resulted from experiments reusing pieces of Murano blown glass, resulting in one-of-a-kind vases, bowls, and glasses that feature a mix of transparent colored shards against an opaque white background. Made in Italy.
  • A beautiful object for everyday use.
  • Mouth-blown Murano glass that is hand-finished.
  • Each piece is one of a kind.
Brand
Stories of Italy
General Dimensions
  • 7⅞" H 5⅛" DIA

title: HAY Phaidon Book
description:
Since 2002, HAY has been a beloved resource for colorful, playful, and functional designs. The first-ever book about the brand, HAY (2022) explores the origins and trajectory of the brand – from its founding in Copenhagen by husband-and-wife team Rolf and Mette Hay to its ever-growing roster of collaborations with designers and brands around the world. HAY features a foreword by John Hoke, Chief Design Officer of Nike, interviews with key collaborations, and an illustrated timeline of key milestones and collaborations over the years.
  • The first-ever book about HAY exploring its origins and trajectory.
  • Includes an illustrated timeline of HAY’s milestones and collaborations.
  • Features a foreword by John Hoke, Chief Design Officer at Nike.
Brand
HAY
General Dimensions
  • 10⅝" H 8⅛" W 1" D
Assembly
Comes fully assembled

2-year warranty

title: Hemisphere Table Clock
description:
The Hemisphere Clock (2021) began with an investigation of wall clocks on the market, revealing a homogeneity of designs – mostly flat discs of about the same size. With Hemisphere, designer Henry Julier offers a counterpoint: The clock floats off the wall, a sculptural form that is as dynamic as it is functional. Includes a stand for optional tabletop use. Runs on one AA battery (not included). Made in Taiwan.
  • Graphic and sculptural form.
  • The clock face, held in place with magnets, can be easily removed for battery replacement.
  • A lack of hour marks and easy-to-read hands complement the bold nature of the clock case.
  • Hemisphere received a 2021 Esquire Home Design Award, given to “the 40 coolest items for your home."
  • Includes a stand for optional tabletop use.
  • Runs on one AA battery (not included).
Brand
Design Within Reach
General Dimensions
  • 5" H 5" W 2" D 5" DIA

title: Hourglass Planter
description:
Accent your plants with the clean goblet shape of the Hourglass Planter (2018). This piece is crafted from smooth sheet metal with an antirust coating for withstanding years of use both indoors and out. Flip it in either direction for a smaller or larger pot. Cleans up easily with a damp cloth. Includes rubber-capped drainage hole. Made in India.

ferm LIVING

title: Silent Vase
description:
The Silent Vase (2013) is a subtle design that puts the focus on shape and complements the flowers it's holding. Made of glass, each vase is mouth blown and then cut and polished for a smooth, shiny finish. Hand wash only, not dishwasher safe. Made in China.
  • Mouth-blown glass.
  • Choice of size and color.
  • Mix and match sizes and colors to create an eye-catching display.

title: Raawii Strøm Bowl
description:
Designer Nicholai Wiig Hansen drew inspiration for his bright Raawii Strøm Bowl (2016) from still lifes by Danish modernist artist Vilhelm Lundstrøm, evoking the vibrant color palette found in much of Lundstrøm’s work. Handmade using a slip-cast technique, it marries refined simplicity with everyday functionality. Made in Portugal.
  • Handcrafted using a slip-cast technique.
  • Glazed ceramic.
  • Inspired by Danish modernist still life paintings.

title: Contour Planter
description:
Thoughtfully designed with a drainage hole and removable saucer so you can tailor the amount of water catchment to suit your plants, the Contour Planter (2018) looks good while helping your green thumb. Made of porcelain, the surface of this planter is designed with a series of ridges or coils for textural interest. Made in USA.
  • Two-piece set: pot and water tray.
  • Water tray is removable.
